verses.verse: Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> has befallen <S%H1961><s%> us; Look, <S%H5027><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> our reproach! <S%H2781><s%>
Our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> has been turned <S%H2015><s%> over to strangers, <S%H2114><s%> Our houses <S%H1004><s%> to aliens. <S%H5237><s%>
We have become <S%H1961><s%> orphans <S%H3490><s%> without <S%H369><s%> a father, Our mothers <S%H1><s%> are like widows. <S%H517><s%>
We have to pay <S%H3701><s%> for our drinking <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> Our wood <S%H6086><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> [to us] at a price. <S%H4242><s%>
Our pursuers <S%H7291><s%> are at our necks; <S%H6677><s%> We are worn <S%H3021><s%> out, there is no <S%H3808><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%> for us.
We have submitted <S%H5414><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> [and] Assyria <S%H804><s%> to get <S%H7646><s%> enough <S%H7646><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>
Our fathers sinned, <S%H1><s%> [and] are no <S%H2398><s%> more; <S%H369><s%> It is we who have borne <S%H369><s%> their iniquities. <S%H5445><s%>
Slaves <S%H5650><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over us; There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to deliver <S%H6561><s%> us from their hand. <S%H3027><s%>
We get <S%H935><s%> our bread <S%H3899><s%> at the risk of our lives <S%H5315><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Our skin <S%H5785><s%> has become <S%H3648><s%> as hot <S%H3648><s%> as an oven, <S%H8574><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the burning <S%H2152><s%> heat <S%H2152><s%> of famine. <S%H7458><s%>
They ravished <S%H6031><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> The virgins <S%H1330><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
Princes <S%H8269><s%> were hung <S%H8518><s%> by their hands; <S%H3027><s%> Elders <S%H2205><s%> were not respected. <S%H1921><s%>
Young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> worked <S%H5375><s%> at the grinding <S%H2911><s%> mill; <S%H2911><s%> And youths <S%H5288><s%> stumbled <S%H3782><s%> under [loads] of wood. <S%H6086><s%>
Elders <S%H2205><s%> are gone <S%H7673><s%> from the gate, <S%H8179><s%> Young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> from their music. <S%H5058><s%>
The joy <S%H4885><s%> of our hearts <S%H3820><s%> has ceased; <S%H7673><s%> Our dancing <S%H4234><s%> has been turned <S%H2015><s%> into mourning. <S%H60><s%>
The crown <S%H5850><s%> has fallen <S%H5307><s%> from our head; <S%H7218><s%> Woe <S%H188><s%> to us, for we have sinned! <S%H2398><s%>

Because <S%H5921><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> our heart <S%H3820><s%> is faint; <S%H1739><s%> Because <S%H5921><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> our eyes <S%H5869><s%> are dim; <S%H2821><s%>
Because <S%H5921><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> which <S%H7945><s%> lies <S%H8074><s%> desolate, <S%H8074><s%> Foxes <S%H7776><s%> prowl <S%H1980><s%> in it.
Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> dost rule <S%H3427><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> Thy throne <S%H3678><s%> is from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> dost Thou forget <S%H7911><s%> us forever; <S%H5331><s%> Why dost Thou forsake <S%H5800><s%> us so <S%H753><s%> <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H753><s%> <S%H3117><s%>?
Restore <S%H7725><s%> us to Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that we may be restored; <S%H7725><s%> Renew <S%H2318><s%> our days <S%H3117><s%> as of old, <S%H6924><s%>
Unless <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Thou hast utterly <S%H3988><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> us, [And] art exceedingly <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H7107><s%> with us.
